Game.Name: Texas Hold 'em Poker (USA, Europe)
Game.plot: Get into the poker craze with Texas Hold 'Em Poker for the Game Boy Advance. The game features a variety of Texas Hold 'Em gameplay, including 5/10 limit play, 25/50 limit play, pot limit play, and no limit play. You can play in single matches, the tournament mode, or the career mode, which lets you compete in tournaments across the country. The game also lets you enter a password to save the money you've earned during your career.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/922252.htmlCheat: Play as Phil Helmuth at all the tournamentsPlay as "Phil" at every event included on Texas Hold 'Em Poker*note (lowercase r,l,u,d in password stands for right arrow, left arrow, up arrow, down arrow)
